chara.textHome: My name is Tsukuyo Amane.

I'm unsure as to what to discuss
on this occasion...

Well, Tsukasa Amane is my twin sister,
and while I serve as the leader of the
Mizuna Girls' Academy Koto Club,
I also practice many fine arts.
As for what I love...my sister, Tsukasa.

As Grandmother's demand for training
pushes me to the brink,
only one task remains.

That is to take wing from this confining
birdcage of a household.
May my song echo far and wide.

Am I now able to protect Tsukasa
as an older sister should?
Neither whining nor lamenting have purpose.

This is what comes from bearing the
unbearable and committing oneself
completely to liberation.

The heart will surely break if it is forced
only to endure, so solace and a source of
energy are necessities for all people.

I know without a second thought
that both of mine are Tsukasa!
How are you?

I have to immerse myself in
training again today...

But with this flute Tsukasa and I
both have, I will be fine.

Good morning. I will withstand the
onslaught of any unreasonable and
violent words I hear today, and try my best!

I presume Tsukasa is eating
right about now?

Her lunch always looks a bit...
unhealthy.
I worry she's not getting the proper nutrition.

Tsukasa is probably busy doing laundry 
or preparing dinner for the apprentices
right about now.

I, on the other hand, leave everything
to my mother to take care of...
It's rather shameful of me, actually...

After a hot bath, I like to head straight
to bed before my body cools down.

A warm bed is as comforting to me
as being with Tsukasa.

It appears we have some time. 
Would you like to learn how to play the flute?

Be careful not to let your
fingertips cover the main hole.
The moment I'm ready to go, I will be leaving.
You see, Tsukasa is waiting for me!
Today, we'll walk around and shop!
The Mirror Witch, how troublesome...

Tsukasa and I are already twins, I wonder 
what would happen if we were to enter?

This is embarrassing to admit, but whenever 
a guest brings me some Western sweets, 
it feels as if my heart is dancing.

I usually only have the chance to
eat Japanese sweets.

They say planting a loquat tree in your yard
will bring about illness, but that's a lie.
Look how healthy I am.

Tsuruno Yui...
She's a quick thinker, therefore,
she's dangerous.
Felicia Mitsuki...

She doesn't seem to think at all, 
so I have no idea what she might do...

If you asked me where my favorite place 
at school is, I'd have to say 
an empty classroom.

People are too respectful towards me
at school, so it's difficult to relax.

To be honest, the sound of wood being
carved is more soothing to me than the
sound of this flute.

This is likely from memories 
of my time living with my father.
I was already pretty old when I met Tsukasa.
Up until then, I had no idea that I had a twin.

It's thanks to the flute my father gave me
that I was able to reunite with Tsukasa...
I will always treasure it…

I would prefer not to speak in depth
about the Wings of the Magius...

*Sigh* 
The taste of green tea really varies
depending on how it's brewed.
Oh, pardon me!
I was just here relaxing, talking to myself...
Let the performance begin!
We have triumphed!
Perseverance bears fruit once again.
Thank you for your attention.
Thus concludes our performance.
I am Tsukuyo Amane.
It is a pleasure to make your acquaintance.

I had intended to commemorate
the occasion with a joyful tune,
so might Tsukasa be present?

Effort, endurance,
and never betraying Tsukasa.

My patience and hard work have
borne fruit once again.

Allow me to recount with
accompaniment from my koto...

Due to Grandmother's insistence
that I be proficient in the ways of
the pen and brush,

teachers have come to heavily rely upon
me for event preparations.

I became the leader of the Koto Club due
entirely to Grandmother's insistence that
I keep to a strict practice regimen.

That and having my juniors' admiration
brings me great joy.
